thread.title: Great Quality and close to what you want to see in London!
thread.title_full: Great Quality and close to what you want to see in London! - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David S
title: Great Quality and close to what you want to see in London!
text: Above average friendliness upon check in. They had my room ready hours before their commitment and the service for the rest of my stay was always exemplary. The Millbank lounge was very enjoyable with Sebastian at the bar adding to the service and friendliness.
